summary: Successfully completed 2 commits. Committed 2 file change(s)

commits.message:
test(tests): update failure limit test assertions

Increase expected file_commits and failure_errors from 25 to 30, and add
assertion for 5 "failure limit" errors in the test.

feat(core): add last run snapshot persistence

Add .kcmt/last_run.json to store the snapshot of the most recent kcmt
run, including metrics, commits, and stats. This enables the new status
command to display formatted summaries, supports compact mode, and
improves observability for tool usage monitoring. The file persists run
data asynchronously after workflow completion.

subjects: test(tests): update failure limit test assertions
feat(core): add last run snapshot persistence
